header.title: phpBB Gallery
phpBB Gallery
header.description:
Einstellungen/Verschiedenes: » Dateitypen: gif, jpeg & png » Bildgröße: Dateigröße, Höhe und Breite » Bilder beim Hochladen verkleinern » Globale Einstellung zu Bewertungen und Kommentaren » Thumbnails: GD-Version, Qualität und Größe » Bilder in 3 Größen verfügbar (Thumbnail, Mittel- und Vollgröße) » Viele Einstellmöglichkeiten zur album.php: Anzahl der Zeilen und Spalten, Anzeigen der Werte (Benutzername, Bewertung, Kommentare, Hochlade-Zeitpunkt,...) » RRC (recent-random-comment): kleines Addon zum Anzeigen der neusten Bilder, zufälligen Bilder und der neusten Kommentare auf der gallery/index.php mit Einstellmöglichkeiten im ACP » Unterordner umbenennbar (Standard: gallery/) » Suchfunktion » Lytebox & Highslide JS Unterstützung (Highslide JS muss auf Grund der Lizenz extra heruntergeladen werden) » Diashow » In weiteren Sprachen verfügbar: http://www.flying-bits.org/go/phpbb_gallery/translations » Verfügbare Addons: http://www.flying-bits.org/go/phpbb_gallery/translations
Integration in phpBB: » Link zur persönlichen Galerie auf der Themenseite (ACP-Option) » Anzahl der Benutzerbilder auf der Themenseite (ACP-Option) » Anzahl der Bilder auf der Index-Seite (ACP-Option) » Neuste und Zufällige Bilder im Benutzerprofil (alle Einstellmöglichkeiten im ACP) » BBCode für die Benutzung in Beiträgen » Verfügbar für prosilver- und subsilver2-basierende Styles
Albenverwaltung / Berechtigungen: » Unbegrenzt tiefer Verschachtelung der Subalben möglich » Beim erstellen/ändern eines Albums können Berechtigungen kopiert werden » Album-typen: Kategorie, Album & Wettbewerb (mehr Informationen weiter unten) » "Album gesperrt"-Option » "Berechtiungen kopieren" Funktion beim vergeben der Berechtigungen » Gruppen- und Benutzerspezifische Rechtevergabe » Berechtigungen für Bilder: ansehen, ansehen ohne Wasserzeichen, hochladen, hochladen mit Freigabe, ändern, löschen, melden, bewerten » Berechtigungen für Kommentare: lesen, schreiben, ändern, löschen » Moderations-Berechtigungen: Kommentare moderieren, Bilder: ändern, löschen, verschieben, Meldungen bearbeiten, Freigeben/Sperren » Weitere Berechtigungen: Album sehen, Anzahl der Bilder, Alben (Nur für persönliche Galerien) » Persönliche Galerien (Hochladen nur durch den Besitzer möglich), mit Subalben, Verwaltung im persönlichen Bereich (UCP)
Bilder/Kommentare: » Hotlink-Schutz: mit erlaubten Ausnahmen » Anzeige der Exif-Daten » Wasserzeichen: mit Mindestbreite/-höhe um kleine Bilder nicht völlig zu überdecken » Meldefunktion » Mehrere Bilder auf einmal hochladen (Anzahl kann im ACP eingestellt werden) » Komplettes Benutzerprofil bei Kommentaren » BBCodes, Benutzerdefinierte BBCodes und Smilies bei Kommentaren und Bild-Beschreibungen » Benachrichtigung (Mail & Jabber) über neue Bilder/Kommentare » Favoriten-Funktion » Nächstes/Vorheriges Bild mit Name und Thumbnail » Ungelesen-Markierung der Alben bei neuen Bildern
ACP: » Statistische Übersicht » Zurücksetzen der Bewertungen für ein Album » Importer für viele Bilder » Galerie reinigen: Möglichkeit zum Löschen von Bildern/Kommentaren gelöschter Benutzer (oder ändern des Autors in Gast) und von persönlichen Galerien
Wettbewerb: » Erster Zeitraum: Hochladen von Bildern ist möglich, Bewertungen und Kommentare sind nicht erlaubt, der Autor ist versteckt » Zweiter Zeitraum: Kein hochladen möglich, Bilder können bewertet werden, Kommentare sind nicht erlaubt, der Autor ist versteckt » Ende des Wettbewerbs: Kein hochladen und bewertet möglich, Kommentare sind erlaubt und der Bild-Autor wird angezeigt
Installion: » Vollständiger Support für Installation und Updates älterer Versionen » Konvertierung von Smartor's "Album MOD" für phpBB2 und visiblethunder's "TS Gallery" für phpBB3

Configurations/Misc: » Filetypes: gif, jpeg & png » Imagesize: filesize, image-height, image-width » Resize images on upload » Global control about comment & rating system (dis-/enable) » Thumbnails: GD-version, quality and size » Images available in 3 sizes (thumbnail, medium, full) » Several options to thumbnail-displaying album.php: number of rows & columns, options to display (username, rating, comments, upload-time,...) » RRC (recent-random-comment): little Addon displaying the recent images, random images and/or recent comments on the gallery/indey.php with full ACP-Control » Sub-folder name adjustable (default: gallery/) » Search function (page for Recent/Random/Top-Rated/Last comments/Own images) » Lytebox & Highslide JS support (Highslide JS must be downloaded seperatly because of the licence) » Diashow » Available in more languages: http://www.flying-bits.org/go/phpbb_gallery/translations » Available Addons: http://www.flying-bits.org/go/phpbb_gallery/addons
Integration in phpBB: » Link to personal gallery on viewtopic (ACP-Option) » Number of user-images on viewtopic (ACP-Option) » Number of images on index (ACP-Option) » Recent/Random images in user-profile (with full ACP-Control) » BBcode to use gallery images in postings » Available for prosilver-& subsilver2-based styles
Album / Permission-management: » Unlimited sub...subalbums depth » Copy permissions on create/edit album » Album-types: Category, album, contest (see later for more information) » "Album locked"-Option » Inherit function on setting permissions » Group- & User-based permissions » Image-permissions: view, view without watermark, upload, upload with approval, edit, delete, report, rate » Comment-permissions: view, post, edit, delete » Moderate-permissions: moderate comments, image: delete, edit, move, handle reports, approve/lock » Misc-permissions: View album, Number of allowed images, albums (for personal galleries) » Personal galleries (upload by owner only), with subalbums and management through UCP
Images / Comments: » Hotlink prevention: also with whitelist » Display exif-data » Watermark: with min-width and min-height, to avoid little images from being fully covered » Report function » Upload more images at once (Number settable in the ACP) » Full user-profile on comments » BBCodes, Custom-BBCodes and Smilies on comments & image-description » Notification (Mail & Jabber) on new images/comments » Option to favorite images » Next/Previous link (with imagename and thumbnail) » Unread-markup of albums with new images
ACP: » Statistical overview » Resync-Options for several dynamic values » Reset rating for album » Mass-import » CleanUp: Ability to delete images/comments of deleted users (or set to anonymous/guest), and personal albums
Contests: » First timeperiod: Upload only, ratings and comments are not allowed, upload-username is hidden » Second timeperiod: No more upload, ratings are allowed, comments are not allowed, upload-username is hidden » End of contest: No more upload and ratings, comments are allowed, upload-username is displayed
Installing: » Full support on install and update » Converters from Smartor's "Album MOD" for phpBB2 and visiblethunder's "TS Gallery" for phpBB3

changelog.change: [Fix] Sort images on slide-show by user set parameters (Bug #513)
[Fix] Increased sql-speed for large databases on image-page
[Fix] Increased sql-speed for large databases on RRC-Addon
[Fix] Not using $db->sql_in_set correctly on delete function of personal albums.
[Fix] Contest-information as (int) for better styling usage. (Bug #511)
[Feature] Added some breadcrumbs to the search.php
[Fix] Logs get deleted by forum_id not by LOG_TYPE (phpbb:Bug #42295) (Bug #510)
[Fix] Copy permissions does not work on "Create album" (Bug #509)
[Fix] Massimport skips images with "&" in filename. (Bug #508)
[Fix] Enter custom ontest-timestamps for start, rating and end. (Bug #505)
[Fix] Call to undefined function can_load_dll() in install/ (Bug #p6712)
[Fix] Personal albums are locked and can not be unlocked. (Bug #504)
[Fix] Display locked images, but prevented them from being commented, edited and rated. (Bug #494)
[Fix] Use set_config_count after 3.0.5 and backport the usage for num_comments/num_pgalleries.
[Fix] Show viewonline, birthdays and statistic on gallery/index.php. (Bug #493)
[Fix] ' in filename, imagename or username cause syntax error on massimport. (Bug #499)
[Fix] Can not rate contest-images with hidden comment field, by wrong access-mode. (Bug #503)
[Fix] Image-counter and unread information are incorrect, when an album was viewed by more than one user. (Bug #501)
[Fix] Missing "Successful uploaded" when number of availbale uploads is smaller than columns count. (Bug #497)
[Fix] General Errors on permissions when selecting no group/album (Bug #498)
[Fix] Hide image-name fields on active checkbox for file-name (Bug #492)
[Fix] SQL-Error on userprofile and gallery-index when no images are displayed. (Bug #496)
[Fix] Missing resync after deleting a personal album (Bug #489)
[Fix] Increased sql-speed for large databases on RRC-Addon
[Fix] Viewing uploader of contest images in several ucp-parts
[Fix] Add config_calue to array, after function call, to avoid "Column 'config_value' cannot be null" on multiple updates
[Change] Rewrote the acp to set permissions much better
[Feature] Display user images on viewtopic.php (Patch by Christian_N and nickvergessen) (Bug #p6321)
[Feature] Read-/Unread-information for albums when new images were uploaded (Bug #129)
[Sec] Unapproved images counter of personal albums is visible on index without permissions (Reported by robbx)
[Sec] Unapproved image comments are visible (Reported by robbx)
[Fix] Hide Exif-Line, if we cant display the exif
[Fix] Upload of images into categories and contest with mass-import
[Fix] "Duplicate entry"-Error on zero-image loop with mass-import (Bug #480)
[Fix] Display-Options for informations in RRC not working (Bug #473)
[Fix] Gallery-log leading with "View forum" to viewforum.php (Bug #478)
[Change] Conntest-system: No comments before rating start, No uploads after rating start
[Change] Rewrite album management to phpbb's forum management
[Fix] Commentsystem independed to the album-locked feature (Bug #471)
[Fix] Missing locked-icon for locked albums in ACP (Bug #470)
[Fix] Missing allowed filetypes through typo in S_ALLOWED_FILETYPES (Bug #469)
[Fix] Argument #2 is not an array - when viewing profile of a user without gallery-entry (Bug #472)
[Fix] Result for contests missing (Reported by redbull254)
[Fix] Missing information about current editing permission-system (Bug #463)
[Fix] Incorrect EXIF data results in errors (Bug #442)
[Feature] Option to view contest winners on RRC (Bug #467)
[Feature] User can grab an image to their personal album (Bug #431)
[Feature] Moderator can create personal album for user to move images (Bug #430)
[Feature] Disallow certain albums from recent/random image blocks (Bug #466)
[Feature] Option to automatically delete outdated files (Bug #464)
[Feature] Album status closed: No comments, images and rates (Bug #448)
[Feature] Config-value for number of comments on rrc-Feature (Bug #433)
[Fix] Display username on personal albums cleanup (Bug #441)
[Fix] Empty links for next/previous in IE
[Fix] Comment-form accessable when comments are disabled
[Fix] Can't rate when comment system disabled
[Fix] Destroyed layout on index when only viewing Personals as album
[Fix] Create Subalbum button visible when it should not (Bug #436)
[Fix] Wrong personal images counters on index (Bug #423)
[Fix] PHP Notice: mktime() expects parameter X to be long, string given (Bug #419)
[Fix] Force user to delete outdated files
[Fix] Images stays reported, when report is deleted (Related to Report #393) (Bug #417)
[Fix] Missing error message for deleting with subalbums (Bug #410)
[Fix] Wrong alternate text on deleting comments
[Fix] Same page-title for all modes on posting.php
[Fix] Slide show doesn't print the hole list on some server configuration (Bug #414)
[Fix] Viewing rate and comment link even if disabled (Bug #413)
[Fix] Can not edit message when use subsilver2 (Bug #406)
[Fix] No note on subsilver2 when no comments were added (Bug #404)
[Feature] Thumbnail Image of Previous and Next images (Bug #400)
[Feature] Config for the recent-part on gallery/index.php (Bug #403)
[Fix] Unable to completely disable Rating and Comments - wrong variables (Bug #397)
[Fix] Images stays reported, when report is closed (Bug #393)
[Fix] Not viewing rates on own images (Bug #391)
[Fix] Animate and Transpate gif's unsopported on image_page
[Fix] Save files with correct name, when downloading
[Fix] resync doens't create entry for p_g_users-table (Bug #388)
[Fix] double checks for same auth => made static (Bug #381)
[Fix] No Info on album-page when image is locked (Bug #376)
[Fix] status of missing files not reset on clean-up (Bug #373)
[Fix] Warning: readfile() has been disabled for security reasons (Bug #380)
[Fix] Thumbnails on recent comments open with wrong adjustment (Bug #379)
[Fix] Call to a member function bbcode_second_pass() on a non-object in gallery/image_page.php
[Fix] Missed to use gallery_root_path on add-on
[Change] ACP-Option for the link-to-click on image-page (Bug #390)
[Feature] Display the number of ratings received (Bug #386)
[Feature] Prev- and Next-Button on album.php (Bug #383 - Patch by Dr.Death)
[Fix] Cut down long albumnames in recent/random and in search
[Fix] Pagination on manage subscription leeds to favorites (Bug #361)
[Fix] installer not working on version compare for mysql (Bug #360)
[Fix] SQL-Error when user is in no group => copy phpBB solution (Bug #348)
[Fix] U_GALLERY_MOD not usign GALLERY_ROOT_PATH on install (Bug #352)
[Fix] Missing update of session, after unset($sql_ary['session_album_id']); (Bug #353)
[Change] gallery/upload/cache/ to gallery/images/cache/ and gallery/upload/ to gallery/images/upload/
[Change] Better Search-Code for second session edit
[Feature] Medium thumbnails to display on image_page.php (Bug #252)
[Feature] Show newest comments and a random picture on index page (Bug #144)
[Feature] Show "Personal galleries" as an category on index page (Bug #142)
[Feature] Remind users on editing the includes/constants.php (Bug #357)
[Fix] ACP Import multiple pages loose image-name (Bug #332)
[Fix] Long file names with _ making out of templates problem (Bug #322)
[Fix] Wrong labels for config values in ACP
[Fix] Uploading multiple files cheats on quota (Bug #326)
[Fix] Slow loading page when creating albums-list (Bug #323)
[Fix] Unable to Approve and Unapprove images (Bug #311)
[Feature] Display message after successful resync in the ACP
[Sec] mcp.php missing check for permissions (Reported by Stifter)
[Fix] Display of users online in the album
[Fix] user_images not updated if it was empty (Bug #306)
[Fix] Empty posintg.php No values specified for SQL IN comparison (Bug #305)
[Fix] [phpBB Debug] PHP Notice: in file /includes/acp/acp_gallery.php on line 296 (Bug #304)
[Fix] Missing information for new approval images (Bug #302)
[Fix] wrong permissions used on viewing personal-gallerys link (Bug #301)
[Fix] Posting Comment/Image: No values specified for SQL IN (Bug #296)
[Fix] array_merge(): Argument #2 is not an array (Bug #284)
[Change] After upload an image into a approval album, the redirect is too fast (Bug #283)
[Change] Login on and redirect to gallery/index.php (Bug #297)
[Feature] Exif Data: Exposure bias, Exposure program & Metering mode
[Sec] "NV Exif data" security risk (Reported by GoBieN)
[Fix] Anonymous comments possible at private albums (Bug #254)
[Fix] UTF8 in file name on Import (Bug #179)
[Fix] Add option to disable watermark for small images
[Change] Moved some Variables to _albums and -images to increase SQL-Speed and reduce number of SQLs
[Change] Reject album deletion leads to 'empty' UserCP page (Bug #263)
[Feature] Limit total number of images by group. (Bug #267)
[Feature] Cleanup-Page: Cleanup DB after delete of an user (Idea on Report #239)
[Feature] MOD supports "MOD Version Check" by handyman´
[Feature] Filled the Statistic-Page in the ACP
[Feature] MOD supports "HighSlide Attachment & IMG" by stokerpiller
[Fix] Image size on massimport when disabled (Bug #248)
[Fix] Potential exposure of real path when unlinking files (Bug #250)
[Fix] When deleting album in subsilver2, language not shown (Bug #240)
[Fix] When editing image 'Title' box isn't populated (Bug #249)
[Fix] Option when create a module for UCP (Bug #237)
[Fix] Wrong permissions used on displaying moderating options (Bug #226)
[Fix] Gallery link on breadcrumbs in viewonline.php (Bug #227)
[Fix] Can't edit or delete comment in subsilver2 (Bug #229)
[Sec] Upload and move images to personal albums
[Fix] SVN: Move images are not working anymore (Bug #175)
[Fix] No personal images in recent images (Bug #194)
[Fix] MCP - Delete images are not working anymore... (Bug #196)
[Fix] Personal gallery of xxxx - PHP Notice error (Bug #198)
[Fix] Display nav-link when using recent_image addon (Bug #207)
[Fix] Personal albums - ucp - move subulbums error (Bug #210)
[Fix] Personal album permissions are messed up. (Bug #209)
[Fix] Categorie - last image are not shown if disapproved (Bug #177)
[Change] Also show new personal images on index page (Bug #143)
[Change] Should not update session page on thumbnail view (Bug #215)
[Change] Album BBcode - mark in one click (Bug #216)
[Feature] Resize image in image view page (Bug #138)
[Feature] Personal Gallery Index - User colour are not showing... (Bug #197)
[Feature] Members should have the ability to create an album (Bug #149)
[Feature] Move pic from private subalbum not possible (Bug #213)
[Feature] Optional black info line at bottom. (Bug #126)
